about_the_game: Featuring everything from driving electronic music to tech-fueled metal riffs, the Glitchpunk soundtrack is the perfect musical backdrop for all your action filled, dystopian sci-fi adventures!
detailed_description: Featuring everything from driving electronic music to tech-fueled metal riffs, the Glitchpunk soundtrack is the perfect musical backdrop for all your action filled, dystopian sci-fi adventures!

name: Glitchpunk - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 134 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 285 MB available space
